pr_title: CLDR-14176 change plural rule regeneration to have exponent samples

timeline.message: CLDR-14176 change generation to have exponent samples

timeline.bodyText: Introduced a new EFixedDecimal for generating exponent samples; here are tests.
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: Introduced a new EFixedDecimal for generating exponent samples. Basically just adds the 'e' feature. I tried to use the non-deprecated ICU classes for this instead, but the access to those is too limited.
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: Modified this so that the temp files can be removed if there is an exception. Avoids muddying the directories.
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: Here are the main changes, moving to EFixedPoint. Had to break out the samples into different groups. I first tried to merge with the range notation, but that got to be really ugly.
timeline.author: macchiati
